name: Strawberry Nut Bread
author: JJOHN32
summary: Another fruit bread to serve with lemonade or hot tea.  This is a very moist bread.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon and sugar in a large mixing bowl
Make a well in the center
Beat together the eggs and oil and pour them into the well
Stir just enough to moisten the ingredients
Fold in the strawberries and nuts
Pour mixture into prepared pans; fill containers no more than half full
Bake in a preheated oven about 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool 20 to 30 minutes before removing from pans
Move to a rack to cool completely before slicing
